summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the execution of a lease to the City, with option to purchase, of the west 85 feet of Lot 1 and all of Lot 4, Block 30, C. D. Boren's Addition to the City of Seattle, for garage purposes, together with certain improvements, machinery and equipment; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
note: Fiche includes architectural plans for 5th & Cherry Garage Building.
